headline: Rosen Law Firm Initiates Investigating Potential Breaches of Fiduciary Duty by Danaher Corporation (DHR)
summary: With significant upside potential, Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR) secures a spot on our list of the 13 Best Diversified Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On September 20, 2025, Rosen Law Firm announced that it is investigating potential breaches of fiduciary duty by Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR)’s directors and officers. Accordingly, the law firm encouraged shareholders […]

headline: Will Danaher's (DHR) New Gene Editing Tool Redefine Its Position in Advanced Life Sciences?
summary: Integrated DNA Technologies (IDT), a Danaher company, recently launched the Alt-R HDR Enhancer Protein, designed to improve homology-directed repair efficiency in gene editing and manufactured by Aldevron, which also operates under Danaher. This breakthrough expands Danaher's capabilities in the competitive cell and gene therapy market by providing a solution that increases gene editing efficiency without sacrificing cell viability or genomic integrity. We’ll examine how this new gene...
